description: Adds or removes Vertica database user and, optionally, assigns roles.

name.description: Name of the user to add or remove.

roles.description: Comma separated list of roles to assign to the user.

login_user.description: The username used to authenticate with.

login_password.description: The password used to authenticate with.

state.description: Whether to create C(present), drop C(absent) or lock C(locked) a user.

ldap.description: Set to true if users are authenticated via LDAP.

password.description: The user's password encrypted by the MD5 algorithm.

port.description: Vertica cluster port to connect to.
